title: Language Education Curriculum Utilizing Collaborative and Distributed Learning Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool usage skills and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: A program aimed at enhancing language proficiency by integrating collaborative learning and knowledge management skills for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform group projects in real-time using collaborative learning tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)
Knowledge-sharing and feedback systems can be established in distributed learning environments to improve peer learning efficiency by over 30%
Learners share language practice materials through digital collaboration platforms and achieve over 80% of weekly learning objectives through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
